title: Diplomatic challenges for new Eastern Euro states

content.question: Directions: Suggested planning and writing time - 35 minutes. Write an essay that: Has a relevant thesis. Addresses all parts of the question. Supports thesis with specific evidence. Is well organized. Considering the period 1918 to 1948, analyze the political and diplomatic problems faced by TWO of the following newly created Eastern European states. Austria Czechoslovakia Hungary Poland

skill.text: Skill 4.A: Identify and describe a historical context for a specific historical development or process.
